Description.Name: Neural Implants evaluation appointment
Description.Details: Have an [[DM.BaseDescriptionDefs[LoreEnhancedImagingDisplay],Enhanced Imaging Display]] but want to get more out of it? Let one of our professional MedTechs assess to see if you can receive [[DM.BaseDescriptionDefs[LoreNeuralImplant],Enhanced Imaging Neural Implants]]! Why do your pilots need this? Well it is simple, a pilot with [[DM.BaseDescriptionDefs[LoreNeuralImplant],Enhanced Imaging Neural Implants]] will have increased combat effectiveness. Schedule your appointment today! WARNING! Neural Implant surgery may cost up to Â¢4,000,000. Our agents are not responsible if you do not have the funds to proceed with surgery. Avoid buying until you have a proper bankroll. Some side effects may occur such as: feedback in the form of potentially lethal electrical shocks; mental instability; paranoia; abusive personality disorder; diarrhea; introversion; Transit Disorientation Syndrome; night blindness; hair loss; amnesia; combat paralysis; catatonic insanity; death
